C1 an animal that produces eggs and uses the heat of the sun to keep its blood warm

Humans, insects, reptiles, birds and mammals are all animals.Birds, fish, mammals, amphibians, and reptiles are all vertebrates.There was a fashion for keeping reptiles as pets.
